name: Sanketh G

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Branding
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

aboutpara: As a civil engineer with 3 years of professional experience as a 3D visualizer, I bring a unique set of skills and expertise to your work. My background in engineering gives a strong understanding of the technical aspects of building design and construction, while my experience as a visualizer allows me to create highly detailed and accurate 3D renderings of projects. In addition to your professional experience, I also have over one year of experience as a freelancer. This demonstrates my ability to manage your own projects and clients, and communicate effectively with stakeholders.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  I'm a 3D Visualizer, Interior Designer and Unreal Engine Artist.
resume.description: I have a solid foundation in the field and can likely handle a variety of projects with confidence. As a 3D visualizer, attention to detail is the key. As a visualizer, I have a strong sense of aesthetics and an ability to come up with unique solutions to design challenges. The ability to clearly and effectively communicate with clients, team members, and other stakeholders is important in any role.

experiences.bullets: Expert in creating 3D models and animations of interior spaces, including kitchens, living rooms, bedrooms, and more, Collaborated with a team of designers and architects to ensure project cohesion and consistent quality

Worked closely with interior designers to understand their vision and bring it to life through 3D models and animations, I have learned about Unreal Engine, rendering, walkthrough videos, and creating applications in Unreal Engine.
